nodes.text: Classic Star Wars: Return of the Jedi (Random House)
Classic Star Wars: Return of the Jedi is a Random House adaptation of Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. First released in 1983 by Random House, it was re-released in 1995 and again in 2004.
It is based on the story by George Lucas and the screenplay by Lawrence Kasdan and George Lucas.

The Rebels plan a daring attack on the Empire's greatest weapon, the Death Star. While Han Solo travels to Endor to disable the Death Star's defense shield, Luke must face not only Darth Vader but the Emperor himself!
